description: Implement a notification system to inform users when their model downloads are complete. This will enhance the user experience by providing feedback on the status of their model downloads, especially since these can take some time. The notification should be triggered once the model download process is finished, and it should include relevant information such as the name of the downloaded model and any next steps the user might need to take.
Refactor the UI to move the 'Force Track' button into a separate debug section. This will help to declutter the main interface and make it clear that this button

Refactor the settings button so it opens a separate window. Don't reuse the onboarding step by step, as it is at the moment. Instead It should open a single window, maybe with some tabs on the left. The tabs should be: permissions, models, debug and about tab. The permissions tab should show that the user has granted the permissions and should not be editable. The models tab should show the models that they have downloaded. The debug tab should allow enabling the debug mode.
